name: FC w/ Anori
description:
丘멆잺 This is an intense run that requires a everybody to be experienced on all bosses to finish within the scheduled time. Please make sure you are confident to perform well on your role and can commit for the full time. This runs is also primarily filled with staff members who know each other. 丘멆잺

**We will do as many CMs as possible, but will revert to NM after 2 tries.**

**Special jobs:**
游댮 **DPS (Portal)**
*W3:* Do Towers at **Escort**.
*W6:* Place Mesmer Portals at **Qadim**.

游린 **DPS (Lamp)**
*W6:* Do the Lamp on your own at **Qadim**.

游댴**DPS (G2 / Pylon)**
*W5:* Take Green 2 at **Dhuum**.
*W7:* Do a Pylon at **QtP**.

游댵 **DPS (Kiter / Pylon)**
*W6:* Kite on **Qadim**.
*W7:* Do a Pylon at **QtP**.

游뽖 **DPS (Epi / Pylon)**
*W5:* Use Epidemic to kill the Tormented Dead on **SH**. (Place Flesh Wurm on Dhuum CM)
*W6:* Do a Pylon at **QtP**.

游리 **DPS (Handkite / G1 / CC)**
*W4:* Kite the hands at **Deimos**.
*W5:* Take Green 1 at **Dhuum**.
*W7* Kill the Wisps at **Sabir** and kill the Anomalies at **QtP**.

<:alac_dps:1023021163045212180> **Alac DPS / Druid (Push / Kite)**
*W5:* Play <:druid:763700489011068939> **Druid** to push Tormented Dead on **SH** and kite the Messengers at **Dhuum**.
Play <:alac_dps:1023021163045212180>  Alac DPS on every other wing.

<:alac_healer:1023021148612595793> **Healmech (Offtank)**
*W1:* Control Seeker on **VG** and kite flak on **Sabetha**.
*W3:* Push the orb on **KC**.
*W4:* Push Rigom at **Samarog**.
*W5:* Tank on **SH**.
*W6:* Tank on **Twin Largos** and **Qadim**.
*W7:* Tank on **Adina** and  **QtP**.

<:quick_healer:1022999250109485146> **Heal Firebrand (Tank / G3)**
*W1:* Tank on **VG** and **Gorseval**.
*W2:* Main reflect on **Matthias**.
*W3:* Tank at **KC** and **Xera**.
*W4:* Tank at **Deimos**.
*W5:* **Switch to Qfb** and tank on **SH** and **Dhuum**. Do Green 3.
*W6:* Tank at **Twin Largos** and take a Wyvern at **Qadim**.
